title: Why some people are turning to artificial intelligence for mental health needs
description: According to a George Mason University flash poll of about 500 people across the country, about 50% reported using AI for support with mental health issues.
content:
Many people are turning to artificial intelligence for coping, feedback, guidance and to be a sort of confidant.

title: Police develop AI system to make quick investigative sketches
description: Japanese police and a university in Aichi Prefecture, along with NTT Data Group Corp, have jointly developed a system to create composite drawings of suspects using artificial intelligence, aiming to save time and allow even nonartists to produce reliable sketches. The system will be trialed between April 2026 through September…

title: Google stock wraps best year since 2009 as AI excites Wall Street
description: Shares of Alphabet rallied in 2025 as the company responded to skepticism of its position in artificial intelligence with new products that excited investors.
content:
Benoit Tessier | Reuters
After a tough start to the year, Google closed out 2025 with its strongest performance — from Wall Street's perspective — since 2009, when the company's shares doubled coming out of the financial crisis.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Wall Street's 2025 Roller-Coaster Ride: AI Gains Amid Turbulence
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. title: Wall Street slides on the final day of 2025 to close out a record year
description: Wall Street’s 2025 gains came as investors embraced the optimism surrounding artificial intelligence and its potential to boost profits across nearly all sectors.
content:
U.S. stocks are slipping in afternoon trading Wednesday as Wall Street closes out a banner year for markets driven by both optimism and uncertainty.
